## ShaderHelper.getInstancedUniform() method

Gets the instance uniform value of type vec4 by uniform index

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getInstancedUniform(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, uniformIndex: number): PBShaderExp;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  uniformIndex | number |  |
